ygData.subject: RE: Looting LORE items
ygData.msgSnippet: you reminded me of another question tho.  got off on my lost RTS story... if you duel in an arena I believe you can loot a LORE item.  But, they may have
ygData.messageBody:
you reminded me of another question tho. got off on my lost RTS story...

if you duel in an arena I believe you can loot a LORE item. But, they may
have already changed this to prevent people from "trading" such items by
dueling in the arena. Now, the sad thing is there will be even less
incentive to duel with that in place. Think about it... all of the really
cool items won't be lootable. So, to plug one gap in the game mechanics we
lose yet again.

-----Original Message-----
From: Chas Watkins [mailto:cwatkins@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 3:16 PM
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'; 'eqenchanters@onelist.com';
'eqrangers@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Looting LORE items


From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>

With the introduction of LORE items. That is the No drop/No trade items.

If you are in a PvP /Duel situation and you lose can the winner loot LORE
items from your corpse.

Does anyone know if the following are lore items

Emperor Crush's armor
Screaming Mace

Does anyone have a definitive answer for what makes an item a lore item. Is
it a quest item or merely a special drop item.

Thanks

Chas
